sectionProduct.subtitle: Use your smartphone.  No download required.  Dining in a restaurant becomes faster, easier and better.

step1.title: Scan QR code
step1.description: Get started by scanning the QR code from the table you're seated at in a restaurant to open a digital menu in your smartphone.

step2.title: Browse and order
step2.description: Always in your preferred language, browse menu items, customize them to your liking, and order them by clicking an ORDER button straight from your mobile.

step3.title: Streamline
step3.description: No wait time, no interruption whatsoever. No matter what you need, it is just a tap away.

hero.header: Order at restaurants in your own language, anywhere.
hero.subtitle: Our mission is to help travelers enjoy the same restaurant experience as at home by enabling them to browse and order from restaurant menus always in their preferred languages while traveling abroad.

sectionMultilingual.subtitle: means 80% of the travelers worldwide can read and order from restaurant menus in their native languages. We work hard to support the remaining 20% soon.  Not only the languages, but check the prices in your own currency, too.

download.title: Where can I download the app?
download.content: You don't have to download or install anything. Dinify runs in your browser with a native user experience. You can add the app to your home screen to use it even offline.

started.title: How do I get started?
started.content: You can start a new experience by scanning a QR code on your table. Our system recognizes your preferred language from your phone setting and opens the menu in the same language. You can also switch the display currency to your home currency in order to avoid converting the prices in the local currency to your home currency

internet.title: Do I need an internet connection?
internet.content: Yes. Dinify is a cloud-based digital menu. However, if you add Dinify into your home screen, it runs even offline, too.

scan.title: How do I scan the QR code?
scan.content: On iOS, use your camera app. On Android, use either Google Lens or one of QR scanner apps. Or, open a web browser (Chrome recommended) and enter https://dinify.app; then click CHECK IN button.

useful.title: What exactly does Dinify for me?
useful.content: Even if you are confident in reading and speaking foreign languages, you may find it difficult to decipher a restaurant menu in foreign cuisine because you’re not familiar with foreign ingredients or their culinary backgrounds. Then, what if you don’t even speak the language in the menu?  Dinify lifts the language barrier you may have in restaurants abroad by enabling you to read and order from the menus always in the language of your choice.  It helps you further to let you enjoy seamless dining even without having to say a word in awkward foreign languages.

free.title: How much is the service?
free.content: The service will stay free of charge while we are in beta. Stay tuned for further notice.

business.title: Why do I need Dinify for my business?
business.content: Firstly, you can serve foreign guests perfectly even without having employees who speak foreign languages. Secondly, it brings you more revenues to your business by increased check sizes (yes, your guests would order 5~25% more thanks to better understanding on your offerings), faster table turn and less wait time. Thirdly, you can enhance your reputation by earning 5-star ratings from the guests delighted by faster, easier and better service. And fourthly, it makes your management simpler and more efficient by automating the front-of-house operation of your business.

translation.title: How do I create my menu in 40 languages?
translation.content: Sign up with us to get access to your own business dashboard within our platform. Once you sign into your dashboard, you can create your menu in 40 languages effortlessly from your native language.  If you have images of your menu items, the whole menu creation can be done in less than a couple of hours.

correct.title: How do I know if the automated translations are correct?
correct.content: We have a robust network of professional translators who cover many languages and make sure your menu is in a perfect shape. Please note some languages are still dependent upon the machine translation, but we work very hard to have all the 40 languages translated by professionals. As of today, English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Russian, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Czech, Hungarian and Slovak are supported by professionals. The other languages are via machine translation: Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Danish, Dutch, Portuguese, Polish, Ukrainian, Romanian, Greek, Bulgarian, Albanian, Slovenian, Arabic, Persian, Urdu, Hindi, Thai, Malaysian, Indonesian, Tagalog, Lao, Vietnamese, Azerbaijani, Hebrew and Georgian.

devices.title: What devices do I need to get started?
devices.content: All the applications for business are cloud-based running in any web browser, so you can use a laptop or tablet that you may already have.

training.title: How much training is required for my employees?
training.content: Not more than 15 minutes. The apps are intuitive, highly user-friendly, and easy to use. We provide you with the user manual with graphics and videos.

trial.title: What happens after the free trial expires?
trial.content: At the end of the free trial, you'll be invited to upgrade to a monthly-recurring paid plan. All you will have to do at this point is to complete the subscription form with your credit card or your preferred method of online payment.  Or, you can walk away if you’re not impressed (though we doubt it).

modify.title: Can I edit/modify my menu?
modify.content: Certainly. This is another robust feature Dinify brings to you. With a printed menu, your business has little flexibility - you cannot add or edit a single menu item without printing new menu cards. With Dinify, you can add, delete, edit any menu items as frequently as you need. You can also hide or show any items any time. A few use cases are:

steps.step2: 2. If you have a new recipe to test the market response, simply add it and test it out. If it doesn't work, simply delete it any time.
steps.step3: 3. If you are out of certain ingredients temporarily, hide the menu item until you have the ingredients in the kitchen.
steps.step4: 4. You may want to run different menu items by different time of a day (like breakfast, dinner-only or happy hours), days in a week (weekend special), or seasons, etc. You can do it. It's just up to your creativity.
